about_the_game:
Dreaminal is an online co-op liminal space puzzle exploration experience where you and up to 3 other players will navigate through eerie, immersive environments inspired by the Backrooms concept. Together, you'll face intriguing puzzles, interact with shifting spaces, and encounter unexpected anomalies, all while making critical choices that affect your path and the levels you explore.


Solve intriguing puzzles for every level, each one with its unique concept and mechanics. Hack your way through a facility computer, navigate dangerous areas, and manipulate time to your advantage. Oh and don't forget to play with the floaties and waterslides in the poolrooms!




Your choices and actions throughout the game influence the ending you receive. Discover hidden levels, uncover new facets of the story, and reach different outcomes depending on how you interact with the environment and approach each puzzle. The levels themselves will shift and change based on the paths you take and the decisions you make, ensuring a unique experience each time you play.


Explore unique levels and multiple sublevels with distinct aesthetics and challenges. Each level offers fresh experiences, hidden secrets, and engaging puzzles to keep gameplay exciting and unpredictable.



Play Dreaminal the way you want, whether that is without entities, normal or nightmare mode where there are more entities, less items and harder to find puzzle parts.
detailed_description:
Get involved in the development and the community


About the Game


Dreaminal is an online co-op liminal space puzzle exploration experience where you and up to 3 other players will navigate through eerie, immersive environments inspired by the Backrooms concept. Together, you'll face intriguing puzzles, interact with shifting spaces, and encounter unexpected anomalies, all while making critical choices that affect your path and the levels you explore.


Solve intriguing puzzles for every level, each one with its unique concept and mechanics. Hack your way through a facility computer, navigate dangerous areas, and manipulate time to your advantage. Oh and don't forget to play with the floaties and waterslides in the poolrooms!




Your choices and actions throughout the game influence the ending you receive. Discover hidden levels, uncover new facets of the story, and reach different outcomes depending on how you interact with the environment and approach each puzzle. The levels themselves will shift and change based on the paths you take and the decisions you make, ensuring a unique experience each time you play.


Explore unique levels and multiple sublevels with distinct aesthetics and challenges. Each level offers fresh experiences, hidden secrets, and engaging puzzles to keep gameplay exciting and unpredictable.



Play Dreaminal the way you want, whether that is without entities, normal or nightmare mode where there are more entities, less items and harder to find puzzle parts.
name: Dreaminal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th gen / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Those can change throughout the development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 11th gen / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Those can change throughout the development

short_description: Dreaminal is a 1-4 player co-op experience set in shifting, Backrooms-inspired environments. Collect samples, solve puzzles, and face anomalies while making choices that alter your path and uncover hidden levels. Evade unknown entities to escape the ever-changing liminal world.
